title: How to Become a Heroine in Your Own Story | Ego Iwegbu
itunes:title: How to Become a Heroine in Your Own Story | Ego Iwegbu
description: Over the years, I have come to appreciate how beautiful it is to watch someone chase their dreams. Think of every movie ever, where we obsess over the heroine. All the highs, the lows, the victories that have us crying with the beauty of it all at the end of the story. This week, the heroine of our story is Ego Iwegbu. She went on a journey to chase her dreams, and there were huge successes and some failures and lessons along the way that she chose not to stop her. She took it as an opportunity to grow and become the heroine of her own story.
